Headline: Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running with significant delays in both directions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with significant delays in both directions.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Pulaski
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to a door problem on the train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to a door problem on the train. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
